name: Sanctuary of Parshath
desc: This card's name becomes "The Sanctuary in the Sky" while it is on the field or in the GY. All Fairy monsters on the field gain 300 ATK and DEF. Set Spell/Traps on the field cannot be destroyed by card effects, and neither player can target them with card effects. Once per turn: You can target 3 Fairy monsters and/or Counter Traps in your GY with different names; place them on top of your Deck in any order.
